class spamclustering.preprocess.encodingConverter.ExtentedEmailMessage(message)

Bases: object

Adds additional modification functions to python EmailMessage.

This class add a more complex payload/content part detection to python EmailMessage class.

Parameters:

message (email.message.Message) – Email message to build this object around.

email_message = None
extract_payload()

Extract payload/content parts from an email. Extract all content parts from the mail and create several payload objects form the extracted data.

header_dict = {'From': None, 'Sender': None, 'Subject': None, 'Thread-Topic': None, 'To': None}

Dict of knwon headers to process.

patternBase64 = '\n(?P<Content>(?:(?:(?:[a-zA-Z0-9=/+]{4})+)\n)+)'

Regex pattern for detecting base64 encded content

patternContentTypeHtml = 'Content-Type: text/html'

Regex pattern for detecting ‘text/html’ content type.

patternContentTypePlain = 'Content-Type: text/plain'

Regex pattern for detecting ‘text/plain’ content type.

patternHtml = '(?P<Content>(<html(?:.|\\s)*/html>)|(<=?\\s?h=?\\s?t=?\\s?m=?\\s?l=?\\s?>(?:.\\s)*/=?\\s?h=?\\s?t=?\\s?m=?\\s?l=?\\s?>))'

Regex pattern for detecting html content

patternQuoted = '\n\n(?P<Content>([a-zA-Z0-9>?@\\[\\]^_`{|}~!"#$%&\'()*+,\\-./:;<]|\\S)*)'

Regex pattern for detecting quoeted printable content.

patternTransferEncoding = 'Content-Transfer-Encoding: '

Regex pattern for detecting tranfer encoding header

pattern_encoding_types = '(?P<Encoding>base64|quoted-printable)\n'

Regex pattern for detecting transferencoding type

payload_list = []
update_content()

Overwrite parts of the mail with the current payloads. Use this object’s list of payload objects to overwrite the respective parts of the original mail with the payload’s content. More detailed, content’s are replaced in place in the email’s serialized string representation. After replacement this string is parsed again to create a new EmailMessage from it.

class spamclustering.preprocess.encodingConverter.MailAnonymizer(extended_mail=None, block_list=None)

Bases: object

Implements anonymization functions applicable to ExtendedEmailMessage.

This class implements functions to anonymize several parts of objects of type ExtendedEmailMessage. It furthermore manages a lookup table to replace some data with the same replacement. To use this features one only needs to replace the value of the member ‘extended_mail’ and call the respective anonymization function. While in default mode only names and address parts of the ‘To’ header are replace, one has the possibility to state domains of interest in a block list. Adding this list will extend the search and replacement of mail aliases containing domains from the list.

anonymize()

Performs different anonymization steps. Overwrites internal mail.

Different anonymization steps are performed on the different parts of an email, stored in ‘extended_mail’ member. In the result, the stored email message will be overwritten with the result of the anonymization.

global_replacement_buffer = {}
key_dict = {}
key_list = []
class spamclustering.preprocess.encodingConverter.Payload(start, end, content, content_type, encoding_type)

Bases: object

Helper class to store payload information.

Content of each part of an email is viewed as one payload. The payload class contains this (encoded) content and offers functionality to modify the content. Moreover the position in the serialized mail is stored, so later an in place replacement can be done.

Parameters:

  • start (int) – Index of the first character of this payload in the source mail

  • end – Index of the last character of this payload in the source mail

  • content (str) – Content of the payload.

  • content_type – MIME type of the content.

  • content_type – Transfer encoding of the mail

Type:

spamclustering.preprocess.encodingConverter.ContentType

Type:

spamclustering.preprocess.encodingConverter.Encoding

decode()

Use the transfer encoding information to decode the content.

Returns:

Returns an array of bytes representing the decoded content.

Return type:

str

do_transfer_encoding(content_bytes)

Use the transfer encoding information to encode the given content. This function will not overwrite the content stored in this class.

Parameters:

content_bytes (bytes) – Bytes array containing the content to encode.

Returns:

Encoded content

Return type:

bytes

set_charset(charset)

Set the char set of the content of this payload.

Parameters:

charset (str) – Character set of the text content, represented as a python codec string.

set_text_content(text)

Overwrites the content stored by this object with the given text. The given text will first encoded into the target character set and then the original transfer encoding will be performed. The result is then used to overwrite the content stored by this object.

Parameters:

text – String used to replace the content.

Type:

str

to_utf8()

Return the content stored in by this object as a UTF-8 string. The content stored by this class is first decoded with respect to the transfer encoding. In the next step the resulting bytes stream is decoded from the respective character set into UTF-8 for python usage.

Returns:

An UTF-8 formatted string.

Return type:

str
